Variant Name: Verona - 30 inch Italian-Made Gas Cooktop with 5 Brass Burners and Continuous Cast Iron Grates in Stainless Steel (Designer / Cooktop / Stainless Steel) - VDGCT530FSS
Variant HTML:
With its five powerful brass burners and continuous cast-iron grates, the Verona VDGCT530FSS 30-Inch Italian-Made Gas Cooktop is designed for performance.

Gas Cooktop by Italian Manufacturer, 30 Inch

Indulge in restaurant-quality cooking without leaving your house with the help of the Verona Italian-Made 30-Inch Gas Cooktop.


Designed and manufactured in Italy

The 30" model, which is Italian-made, has an elegant design with ergonomic soft-touch knobs and continuous cast-iron grates.


Designed to Perform

The cooktop is designed for performance, with high-power brass burners and a triple-ring center burner that can easily switch from simmering to searing.


Extra Functions:

  • Digital Spark Plug
  • Fifteen Brass Grills
  • Design of the Front Control Knob
  • Grating and Caps Made of Continuous Cast-Iron
  • Device to prevent flame failure
  • Material: Stainless Steel


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Engine Starter.
    • Eliminates the need for a pilot light by lighting burners automatically.
  • The Safety of Flame Failure.
    • Prevents the buildup of dangerous gas inside your cooker and kitchen by stopping the flow of gas to the burner when the flame has been extinguished.
  • Rubberized Knobs for a Gentle Touch.
    • A more precise temperature adjustment is guaranteed by these ergonomic and non-slip gloves.
  • Metal Fire Pits.
    • Burners made of long-lasting, energy-efficient brass offer even heat distribution and peak performance for years to come.
  • Grates made of continuous cast iron
    • Grates made of heavy-duty material guarantee stability and uniform heat distribution.
  • Two Heat Sources
    • Powerful heating with improved heat coverage is what you get with a dual flame burner.
